attributes.action: Protect freedom of share and freedom for internet
attributes.additional_details: Many of you have seen the black out over SOPA (Stop online privacy) and PIPA (protect intellectual property) in the USA. We think that we should have a bill to protect government from controling the internet without the public approval. We need to protect our internet their should be a law on public right to vote over any new internet laws & Protect websites from USA laws for copyright when it's not the owner that uploads illegal content. UK should NOT allow the British public  being sent to USA over copyright claims when their not uploading illegal content
